name: Foodtastic Adventure
description:
HELP THE VILLAGER DELIVER A SPECIAL DISH TO THE KING

After done with cleaning your house, you are asked to make a special dish for your king's feast. Prepare it and make your way to his castle in this little fun puzzle adventure game.

We would really appreciate if you could give us your feedback through the following form to help us improve the game. Thank you very much!

https://forms.gle/VPC2QjJXZW66Jn8L9

This is a prototype version. The game is in it's early stages.

Features
  • Simple and enjoyable narrative
  • Fun puzzles with push mechanics
  • Challenging riddles
  • Interactions with the environment
  • Easy inputs!
Controls
  • Arows / WASD - Move
  • Z - Interact
Credits

Raquel Pereira (Game Artist & Game Designer)

Rodrigo Jordão (Game Artist)

Rúben Gaspar (Game Designer & Game Developer)

Made with GB Studio

Assets used
  • Pixel Pete's Art Assets by Pixel Pete - Available  here
  • GB Studio Character pack by Parabellum Games - Available here
  • GameBoy Emporium (GBstudio) by Parabellum Games - Available here
  • Raou Dungeon Tileset by @raoucemar
